item.title: When i add my custom item and ::pickup i frezze 0o
item.dc:creator: @daniel89 daniel89
item.description:
@daniel89 wrote:

Yo so i just made a guthix godsword. 2 different model ids one for equip and one for ground and inventory placement.

So i converted them back from mqo back to .dat files and i compressed them like the other ones in my client (which might be what im doing wrong) but after i added the model ids with my add model button and restarted client.

When i pickup the itemid i set it to i frezze. When i edit my character file and place the item id i choose 13639 in my weapon spot and log in im invisible and i dont frezze untill i click equiped interface.

So i think i did something wrong and cant figure out what.

Heres my int for the guthix godsword.

The 30104 is my ground and inventory id and the 30103 is the equip id. I know the height and all of that is right cause i imported another godsword and cut off the hilt and placed mine on it . I didnt use no lines i used triangles.

Anyone got any ideas???

if(i == 13639) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0]; class8.anInt174 = 30104; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 1957; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 484; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 30103;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 30103;//female wearing class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Guthix Godsword";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A heavy sword".getBytes();//examin info }

P.S.

If you wanna contact me 3 times faster add my msn.
ravenel_finest@hotmial.com

Read full topic
